org.apache.flink.queryablestate.network

类 AbstractServerBase<REQ extends MessageBody,RESP extends MessageBody>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.queryablestate.network.AbstractServerBase<REQ,RESP>
  • 类型参数:
    REQ - the type of request the server expects to receive.
    RESP - the type of response the server will send.
    直接已知子类:
    KvStateClientProxyImpl, KvStateServerImpl

    @Internal
public abstract class AbstractServerBase<REQ extends MessageBody,RESP extends MessageBody>
extends java.lang.Object
    The base class for every server in the queryable state module. It is using pure netty to send and receive messages of type MessageBody.

    • 嵌套类概要

      Channel pipeline initializer.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • AbstractServerBase

        protected AbstractServerBase(java.lang.String serverName,
                             java.net.InetAddress bindAddress,
                             java.util.Iterator<java.lang.Integer> bindPortIterator,
                             java.lang.Integer numEventLoopThreads,
                             java.lang.Integer numQueryThreads)
        Creates the AbstractServerBase.

        The server needs to be started via start().

        参数:
        serverName - the name of the server
        bindAddress - address to bind to
        bindPortIterator - port to bind to
        numEventLoopThreads - number of event loop threads

    • 方法详细资料

      • createQueryExecutor

        private java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService createQueryExecutor()
        Creates a thread pool for the query execution.
        返回:
        Thread pool for query execution

      • getQueryExecutor

        protected java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService getQueryExecutor()
        Returns the thread-pool responsible for processing incoming requests.

      • getServerName

        public java.lang.String getServerName()
        Gets the name of the server. This is useful for debugging.
        返回:
        The name of the server.

      • initializeHandler

        public abstract AbstractServerHandler<REQ,RESP> initializeHandler()
        Returns the handler to be used for serving the incoming requests.

      • getServerAddress

        public java.net.InetSocketAddress getServerAddress()
        Returns the address of this server.
        返回:
        AbstractServerBase address
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If server has not been started yet

      • start

        public void start()
           throws java.lang.Throwable
        Starts the server by binding to the configured bind address (blocking).
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - If something goes wrong during the bind operation.
        java.lang.Throwable

      • attemptToBind

        private boolean attemptToBind(int port)
                       throws java.lang.Throwable
        Tries to start the server at the provided port.

        This, in conjunction with start(), try to start the server on a free port among the port range provided at the constructor.

        参数:
        port - the port to try to bind the server to.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - If something goes wrong during the bind operation.
        java.lang.Throwable

      • shutdownServer

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.Void> shutdownServer()
        Shuts down the server and all related thread pools.
        返回:
        A CompletableFuture that will be completed upon termination of the shutdown process.

      • isEventGroupShutdown

        @VisibleForTesting
public boolean isEventGroupShutdown()
